item.title: Joe Biden Stumbles in Second Democratic Debate
item.description: He stammered, evaded, and wilted. He allowed himself to get flummoxed by Bill de Blasio, which is like allowing your car to get bested by a Pinto. And he fumbled a kill shot against Kamala Harris. But the rest of the field didn’t perform much better.
